articles.content: The players were told via teleconference on Tuesday evening of a proposal in which they would head into one hub for eight weeks - three weeks of pre-season and then five compressed weeks of games - before going home for a week or so, and then entering another… [+4381 chars]

articles.title: Top 10: Lost Formula 1 circuits - PlanetF1
articles.description: We have seen many circuits come and go in the world of Formula 1, some have stood the test of time, others have vanished from the calendar.
articles.content:
We have seen many circuits come and go in the world of Formula 1, some have stood the test of time, others have vanished from the calendar.
Sadly Formula 1 doesn’t stand still as the time passes, and we have lost some truly classic venues.
Here are PlanetF1… [+8384 chars]

articles.description: The interim NRL chief executive has defended the difference in fines for Latrell Mitchell, Josh Addo-Carr and Nathan Cleary.
articles.content:

articles.title: Japan would 'scrap' Olympics if not held next year - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Tokyo 2020 president Yoshiro Mori said that the Olympic Games, already postponed to 2021, would be "scrapped" if it could not take place then, according to published interview.
articles.content:
However the former prime minister remained confident the they would go ahead in 2021.
"We have delayed the Olympics until next summer after we will have won the battle," he was quoted as saying.

articles.description: West Coast captain Luke Shuey admits he ducked to receive a free kick in the final moments of 2017’s extra-time elimination final win over Port Adelaide.
articles.content:
